hero.title: Join Our Team
hero.subtitle: Build the future of technology with us. We're looking for talented individuals who are passionate about innovation and making a difference.

seniorEngineer.title: Senior Software Engineer
seniorEngineer.description: Join our engineering team to build cutting-edge solutions using modern technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Strong expertise in React, Node.js, and TypeScript
responsibilities: Lead technical projects and mentor junior developers
Review code and provide technical guidance
Collaborate with product and design teams

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: Lead product strategy and development for our innovative technology solutions.
requirements: Strong understanding of software development lifecycle
Track record of successful product launches
responsibilities: Work closely with engineering and design teams
Conduct market research and competitor analysis
